effects.effect: Each target can fly up to their speed and make a free strike. If a target doesn't land in an unoccupied space, they fall.

items.name: Precog Reflexes
items.trigger: A creature within distance makes a strike against the tyrannis.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The strike takes a bane. After the strike resolves, the tyrannis can make a free strike against the target.
The strike has a double bane instead.
At the end of each of their turns, the tyrannis can take 5 damage to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.
The tyrannis doesn't take a bane on strikes against creatures with concealment.

effects.name: Effect

items.name: Stick to the Plan!
items.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target can end one effect on them or can move up to their speed.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The tyrannis fires a sensor mine into each unoccupied square in the area, and creates a gravity well whose area contains one or more squares of the tyrannis's space (see Gravity Well). Whenever an enemy enters a square with a sensor mine in it, the mine explodes, dealing 3 damage to the enemy.
